com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Class NodeService

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.datamodel.services.Service
      com.compendium.core.datamodel.services.ClientService
          com.compendium.core.datamodel.services.NodeService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IClientService, INodeService, IService, java.io.Serializable
public class NodeService
extends ClientService
implements INodeService, java.io.Serializable

The interface for the NodeService class The NodeService class provides services to manipuate NodeSummary record data in the database.

See Also:

createNode

public NodeSummary createNode(PCSession session,
                              java.lang.String sNodeID,
                              int nType,
                              java.lang.String sXNodeType,
                              java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                              int nPermission,
                              int nState,
                              java.lang.String sAuthor,
                              java.lang.String sLabel,
                              java.lang.String sDetail,
                              java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                              java.util.Date dModificationDate)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
Adds a new node to the database and returns it if successful

Specified by:
createNode in interface INodeService
Parameters:
session - the session object for the database to use.
sNodeID - the id of the node being created.
nType - the integer type of the node being created.
sXNodeType - the extended node type of the node being created.
sOriginalID - the original ID if relevant else empty String.
nPermission - the permission level of the node being created.
nState - the inital state of the node being created
sAuthor - the author of this node
sLabel - the label of this node
sDetail - the primary details (page 1 of any details), for this node
dCreationDate - the creation date of this node
dMmodificationDate - the modification date of this node (same as creation date).
Returns:
NodeSummary, the node summary object representing the node created successfully, otherwise null.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
